reviews.review:
When it comes to being a good game, Portal 2 hits most of the sweet spots.
Pros:
-The story is very engaging and ties into the gameplay
-The puzzles work very well in forcing your mind to think outside the box
-The addition of multiplayer made the game a hundred times better
-The ability to create, test, and play custom made test chambers by the community is a wonderful feature that should be treasured
-The game is amazingly well made. Graphics are VERY good, and it's surprising since the game came out in 2011
-There are challenges for after you beat the game such as timed tests, least portals placed, and least steps taken for singleplayer AND co-op which adds a ton of content for competitive players or completionists.
Cons:
-It can get boring after beating singleplayer and multiplayer, and nowadays there aren't that many unique test chambers being created. Overall, not that much replayability after getting 100% completion
-The multiplayer is lacking in players, so it may take a long time to find a partner (even if you're looking for people in steam discussions time zones and connection issues still exist)
-Multiplayer has a few bugs that enable the player to skip or cheese many chambers. This makes achievements like Still Alive which is supposed to be the hardest to get way easier when these glitches are utilized

Portal 2 is a game that doesn't have a lot of replayability, but when you play it for the first time it gives you an experience like no other. VERY well worth the money, and if you have an IQ of 50 or more I recommend buying this game, especially with a friend to enjoy co-op with. For parents, do make sure you monitor your child whenever he plays co-op as there may be some unfriendly people here and there. Otherwise, the game is a great way to engage your child and get their brain juices flowing.
Very fun and hard game. it has a good story too. overall if you have not played this classic; play it.

Still a very fun game. GlaDOS' dialogue makes the sometimes frustrating puzzles bearable. Also, co-op is both more fun and less friendship-ripping than Monopoly.
its a great platformer with great physics and its worth paying

0. 如果双方有人使用中文的ID，把他改成英文
1. 把win10的防火墙关掉，在windows安全中心，防火墙和网络保护，有三个项目：域网络、专用网络、公用网络（不知道是哪个的问题，反正我都关了，游戏结束再打开）

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons, what the heck am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
9/10 my house is on fire
o melhor jogo pra passar o tempo off
Amazing game, the community test chambers provide endless hours of fun mind melting puzzles.  Insane value.  Buy this game.
This game is easily one of my favorite games of all time. It takes all of the great puzzle mechanics from the first game, improves upon them, and mixes in an engaging story to go along with it.
Fun, challenging puzzle game with great story! Single player of coop, both are excellent!
Игра где надо думать и это затягивает а в сюжете очень много смешных шуток

The game might be considered old by today's standards, but I consider its value timeless. I believe this game's value in the current time is analogous to Shakespeare's read value, it might be old, but timeless. This is a game I will recommend to anyone of the younger generation, to actually learn what a masterpiece of a game actually is.
Juste excellent jeu, a recommander ABSOLUMENT. Jeu INCONTOURNABLE. Voila.
this games storyline is a whirlwind of plot twists. it is also suitible for all ages
Very good. play multiplayer or single but overall best game ever
not gonna lie, its pretty gud!

Very good game full of action and what the most important - you need to think hard sometimes. Storyline is simple but interesting and everything it in the future technology theme! Portal 2 is one of the best games in my steam library so I want other people to know how good game it is.

I don't know any other comparable game...
To me it was extremely innovative! I love the idea behind Portal. It challenges your patients, memory and your ability to solve complex problems. Particularily if you're stoned... xD Sure, for some people its easier ;) and i feel like others can't even play it lol

great to play with a friend

Игра одна из самых лучших игр которую я видела. Хорошая задумка, графика, не надоедающее прохождение головоломок взахлёб. Да, есть некоторые недоработки в плане русской озвучки (например некоторые писки и треск после чьей либо реплики или не озвученные маленькие кусочки текста) но всё это не слишком отвлекает от прохождения. Всем кто никогда не играл во второй Portal, советую. И перед прохождением желательно посмотреть хотя бы краткий сюжет 1 Portal что бы весь сюжет. Хорошей игры)
Make Sure to play Portal 1 First! Best game with an actual story line! As my friend says, "It's 10X better than Portal 1!".  Is a MUST PLAY!

ich Finde, dass Portal 2 ein sehr gelungenes Rätzel spiel und auch auf schwächeren Geräten gut spielbar ist.
Der neue CO-OP-Multiplayer und der Testkammer Editor sind auch Positiv anzumerken.

Fly me to the moon
And let me play among the stars
Let me know what Spring is like
On Jupiter and Mars.

très très très bon jeu! Il est bien fini, les images et l'anime sont vraiment bien faites. Un contenu très complet avec plusieurs modes comme la coop, le mode défi, les salles de tests de la communauté, mais mon préféré c'est la création des salles de tests. Le gameplay est bien et les énigmes sont, au début, très simple, mais ça devient de plus en plus dur et augmente jusqu'à que votre tête explose. Le sénario est vraiment cool mais je n'en dis pas plus pour ne pas spoiler.
